header.greeting: HI, my name is Danila Kulinkovich

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Frontend Developer with experience in building user-friendly and high-performance web applications. My core stack includes React, TypeScript, Vite, RTK Query, and SCSS, but I am also confident working with Node.js, databases, cloud services, and preprocessors.
about.text1: I combine strong frontend expertise with a solid understanding of backend development, enabling me to contribute effectively across the full development cycle. I know how to transform designs into clean, responsive interfaces and work efficiently with a wide range of libraries and tools.
about.text2: Focused on code quality, performance optimization, and user experience. Always eager to learn new technologies and take on exciting projects.
